meanings.definition: A slang term for blue-colored objects or clothing.
meanings.sent1: She loved to wear her bright blueys to school every day.
meanings.sent2: The sky was filled with fluffy white clouds and a few blueys.
meanings.sent3: When he accidentally dyed all his clothes blue, he ended up with a wardrobe full of blueys.
meanings.sent4: The ocean stretched out before her, a vast expanse of shimmering blueys.
meanings.sent5: The artist's palette was a beautiful array of colors, including various shades of blueys.

meanings.definition: A slang term for blue-colored pills, typically referring to amphetamines.
meanings.sent1: He was caught trying to sneak a few blueys into the party.
meanings.sent2: The doctor prescribed some blueys to help with her energy levels.
meanings.sent3: The blueys in the medicine cabinet looked tempting, but she knew better than to take them.
meanings.sent4: The blueys on the table seemed to call out to him, promising a quick energy boost.
meanings.sent5: The blueys rattled in the bottle, a reminder of the potential dangers they held.

meanings.definition: A slang term for blue-colored bruises or marks on the skin.
meanings.sent1: After the fall, she was left with painful blueys on her knees.
meanings.sent2: The boxer sported a black eye and a few blueys on his arms after the match.
meanings.sent3: She joked that her clumsiness always led to a collection of blueys on her body.
meanings.sent4: The blueys on his face told the story of a rough night out.
meanings.sent5: The child proudly displayed his blueys from playing in the park, a badge of outdoor fun.
